description: Once you've cooked your roast chicken in the slow cooker you may never go back, perfectly cooked and juicy every time.
name: Slow Cooker Roast Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large onion, peeled and sliced into rings

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the butter with thyme and garlic. Ease the skin gently away from the chicken breasts and spread the butter underneath evenly.
Place the onions rings in the base of the slow cooker, pour in the stock and wine and place the chicken on top, breast side up.
Place the lid on and cook on high for 45 minutes. Reduce the heat to low and cook for 8 hours until tender.
